title: Japanese Core 6000: Step 8
description: Welcome to Step 8 of the Japanese Core 6000. The Core 6000 is designed to help advanced students reach a level where they can read difficult materials on their own. Students who master all 6,000 words in the Japanese Core category will be well on their way to mastering Japanese!

series.name: Japanese Core 6000
series.short_description:
The Core 6000 is designed to help advanced students reach a level where they can read difficult materials on their own.

Students who master all 6,000 words in the Japanese Core category will be well on their way to mastering Japanese!
